Module edu.citadel.cprl
Package edu.citadel.cprl

Class Parser

java.lang.Object
edu.citadel.cprl.Parser
public final class Parser extends Object
This class uses recursive descent to perform syntax analysis of the CPRL source language and to generate an abstract syntax tree.

  • Method Details

    • parseProgram

      public Program parseProgram() throws IOException
      Parse the following grammar rule:
      program = initialDecls subprogramDecls .
      Returns:
      the parsed program. Returns a program with no initial declarations and no statements if parsing fails.
      Throws:
      IOException
